channel.title: Hugo Fresh Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Fresh Theme

item.title: Course Meterial
item.description: Textbook We will be using the following book. It is open source and you can use PDF or the EPUB version. You can also view the HTML pages here. Title: Computer Networks: A Systems Approach Authors: Larry Peterson and Bruce Davie Copyright: Elsevier, 2012 Source: https://github.com/SystemsApproach License: CC BY 4.0 Raspberry Pi - We will be using Raspberry PIs for the projects. You will need to buy them but you get to keep them at the end of the semester.

item.title: Syllabus1
item.description: This is a tentative schedule and will change. Week 1 - August 26, 28, 30 - Introduction, Network terminologies, Architecture vs Protocols September 2 - Labor day, no class Week 2 - September 4, 6 - Connecting machines, Reliable Delivery, Ethernet, Access protocols September 8 - Last date to drop class Week 3 - September 9, 11, 13 - Packet Switching September 15 - Project 1 Due Week 4 - September 18, 20, 23 - Internetworking, Transport Protocol
